com.cs7s.webpage.authentication

Class CurrentUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs7s.webpage.authentication.CurrentUser

  • public final class CurrentUser
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles who the current user is.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CURRENT_USER_SESSION_ATTRIBUTE_KEY
      The attribute key used to store the username in the session.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String get()
      Returns the name of the current user stored in the current session, or an empty string if no user name is stored.
      static void set(java.lang.String currentUser)
      Sets the name of the current user and stores it in the current session.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • CURRENT_USER_SESSION_ATTRIBUTE_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String CURRENT_USER_SESSION_ATTRIBUTE_KEY
        The attribute key used to store the username in the session.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static java.lang.String get()
        Returns the name of the current user stored in the current session, or an empty string if no user name is stored.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the current session cannot be accessed.

      • set

        public static void set(java.lang.String currentUser)
        Sets the name of the current user and stores it in the current session. Using a null username will remove the username from the session.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the current session cannot be accessed.
